1.text: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
1.simplified_example: Before anything else existed, God made the entire universe.

26.text: Then God said, 'Let us make man in our image, after our likeness.'
26.simplified_example: God decided to create humans to be like Him, to reflect His character and nature.

1.text: And God spoke all these words, saying,
1.simplified_example: God began speaking these important commandments to His people.

12.text: Honor your father and your mother, that your days may be long in the land that the Lord your God is giving you.
12.simplified_example: Show respect and care for your parents, and God will bless you with a long, good life.

1.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
1.simplified_example: The Lord takes care of all my needs, just like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

4.text: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
4.simplified_example: Even when I go through really hard and scary times, I won't be afraid because I know God is with me protecting and comforting me.

16.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
16.simplified_example: God loved people so much that He sent His only Son Jesus. Anyone who believes in Him will live forever with God.
